abstract: A regulatory filing by JPMorgan Chase reveals a few more details about its otherwise closely guarded fund for investing in social media.
snippet: A regulatory filing by JPMorgan Chase reveals a few more details about its otherwise closely guarded fund for investing in social media.
lead_paragraph: One of the touchiest topics at JPMorgan Chase these days is its plans for a new fund to invest in the hot social media sector, brimming with Internet companies like Facebook and Twitter.

headline.main: JPMorgan Raises $1.2 Billion for Social Media Fund

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
